body: so the ntr here is the main character (mc) who got ntr from his friend because the tattoo(on his arm)from the poster of the doujin is the girl's brother

@woovshh @animo_kun There is no incest. The translator translated the Korean  word "Oppa" into "brother" without at least leaving a note about the context(it's used by women to address older men). Nobody is related to anyone here.

Basic cheating pornhwa where the friends girlfriend is the one actively cheating with the mc and since it's korean you read from left to right for those struggling with panel placements.

Anyway to sum this up as I see a lot are confused, friend and fmc are dating which is hinted at during the story(he's buying "his girls" fav condoms), mc and friend split up and mc goes to fmc because he wants to fuck as she's clearly been flirting with him the entire night of them drinking and thus begins their relationship and her secret with him as she starts to cheat on the friend, they continue fucking until mcs friend visits the fmc while he's there and fmc tries to hide him and she's lies to the friend to try and get him to buy her some new condoms(she doesn't let him hit raw if that wasn't clear enough) and that's when mc notices the condom brand and realizes he's been fucking his friends girlfriend and he's about to be caught as his friend walks into the room, end of story.

This also isn't likely to be an incest story, brother and sister in korean is both for family and friends like oppa/noona/hyung/dongsaeng(honorifics) etc so when translated into english that simply turns into older/younger, brother/sister whether they're related or not so don't look too deeply into that connection as it's just 2 friends banging the same girl and that's her secret as she allowed it to happen and she's the one cheating on the other guy in the story

@random_stranger he mentions that they're for tomorrow, he was going home and would visit the girl he's seeing the next day(the girl that starts a secret with the mc) and he fucks her off screen which is shown when mc sees the box of used condoms and her asking him to buy more
